<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The auxillary symbols are structs of sizeof(coff&#95;symbol16) each.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the big object format (where symbols are coff&#95;symbol32), each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/coff/coffreader/#ad5bbf959c3d5d899e297759bc4172438"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Object&gt;</a>&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/coff/coffreader/#ad5bbf959c3d5d899e297759bc4172438">COFFReader::create</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Obj = std::make&#95;unique&lt;Object&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsBigObj = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-file-header">coff&#95;file&#95;header</a> &#42;CFH = COFFObj.getCOFFHeader()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj-&gt;CoffFileHeader = &#42;CFH;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header">coff&#95;bigobj&#95;file&#95;header</a> &#42;CBFH = COFFObj.getCOFFBigObjHeader();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CBFH)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(object&#95;error::parse&#95;failed,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;no COFF file header returned&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only copying the few fields from the bigobj header that we need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and won&#39;t recreate in the end.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj-&gt;CoffFileHeader.Machine = CBFH-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header/#abd23558a463c34ebfaa6cbec428f81ea">Machine</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    Obj-&gt;CoffFileHeader.TimeDateStamp = CBFH-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header/#adf2a7996e1f450a984ef3b84e248652e">TimeDateStamp</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">    IsBigObj = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = readExecutableHeaders(&#42;Obj))</Highlight></CodeLine>
